title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Bandon, Oregon
content:
Photo submitted by Deb Pietrzak, “I ride on the beaches and along the coast of the Pacific Ocean in Bandon, Oregon. I am 68 and have clocked 1200 miles in 4 months.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Bandon, Oregon appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
